text: The 2002 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season was the 12th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The 2002 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was hosted by the Missouri Valley Conference and won by Creighton. == Teams == == MVC Tournament == == See also == * Missouri Valley Conference * Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer tournament * 2002 NCAA Division I men's soccer season * 2002 in American soccer == References == Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:2002 NCAA Division I men's soccer season
title: 2002 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season
